name: MedWar The Game
description:
Game developed for the Game Jam of Granollers 2019 (1st place). The themes to develop were: trees, medieval age and food.

The game is about creating and managing your own troop to destroy the base of the enemies and defending your own. 

Developers: 

- Max Faro

- Manel García

- Toni Galmes

- Martí Guillot

Artists:

- Júlia Blasco

- Rodrigo Ben
